index.subtitle_1: Ready to journey back in time

call_for_speakers.title: Call for proposals
call_for_speakers.description: Calling on all Python enthusiasts! Submit your proposals for PyCon Colombia 2024 now. Don't miss the opportunity to share your insights
call_for_speakers.topics_description_1: We welcome a diverse range of proposals related to various technical topics. Share your expertise on any of the following subjects:
call_for_speakers.topics_description_2: Also you can talk about other general topics:

content.description: We are inviting all the Python Community to submit proposals to PyCon Colombia 2024, don't hesitate to submit yours! or, if you know somebody who you think should be speaking at PyCon Colombia, please send them this

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.description: PyCon Colombia can be your platform to gain brand recognition, take leads and recruit from an audience of highly skilled professionals!
